pathAssistantSteps.info:
Definition: Opportunities where customer has approved technical solution. Finalizing remaining commercial details.


Key Actions before moving to Best Few:

  1. Finalize price and commercial negotiations
  2. Complete customer set up
  3. Finalize supply plan and strategy
  4. Add opportunity to financial forecast once first PO is received

• Complete "Loss Reason" field
  • Please include in notes why we lost the opportunity? What contributed to losing this opportunity?
  • What do we need to do differently to improve our chances of winning?
Definition: Opportunities where Ascensus has received the first commercial order. The first order does not include sales of trial quantities.

Definition: Opportunities where customer is actively evaluating Ascensus technology to determine fit. Includes sampling and trials.


Key Actions before moving to Best Few:

  1. Approval of Ascensus products in customers application
  2. Understand customers use case and how Ascensus creates value in the customers process/product

Definition: Opportunities where Ascensus has a confirmed application and customer contacts.


Key Actions before moving to Development:

  1. Nurture contacts at the account
  2. Understand the customers end product and application for SBH
  3. Develop initial volume and revenue estimates
  4. Define success criteria for development

Note: Samples should not be sent until the development stage

Definition: Opportunities that Ascensus believes exist.


Key Actions before moving to qualified:

  1. Identify and engage contacts at the account
  2. Confirm that the customer has an application where Ascensus has a value proposition.
  3. Complete key fields
